My First Post
item.description: Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text. Visit the Hugo website!

item.title: About
item.description: Photo credit: Danish Prakash I’m Raunaq, I love travel, food, and technology (in that order) (and some other things). I currently live in Bengaluru and am taking time to explore (read: unemployed) the latest and greatest in AI technologies while contributing to open source projects. Here’s a non-exhaustive list of stuff I’ve done over the years, each condensed to a single sentence: [2025-Present] Exploring AI Agents, MCP servers, and building side projects to become better at using LLM based tools while contributing to open source.

item.title: Food
item.description: These are my culinary love storiesâ€”dishes so extraordinary they’ve made me a romantic, returning to the same restaurants until the menu feels like poetry and the staff like family. Pad Thai, Thip Samai, Bangkok
